1.name: Dimension Reduction Dice
1.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> extra Blessing(s) can be chosen, but the number of available Blessings will be reduced by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> time(s).

2.name: Chaos Trametes
2.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, increase the number of free Blessing resets by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>.

3.name: Warping Compound Eye
3.desc: When choosing Blessings after winning a battle, Enhance all 1-star Blessings that appear.

4.name: Fruit of the Alien Tree
4.desc: After winning a battle, revive all downed characters in the current team and restore their HP to their Max HP. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> time(s).

5.name: Casket of Inaccuracy
5.desc: Gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>–<unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> random Blessings after obtaining this Curio.

6.name: Ambergris Cheese
6.desc: After winning a battle, all allies restore HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their respective Max HP.

7.name: Fortune Glue
7.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, all Blessings that appear are guaranteed to be of 3-star rarity. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> time(s).

8.name: The Parchment That Always Eats
8.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their respective Max HP.

9.name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
9.desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 1-star Blessing.

10.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
10.desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 2-star Blessing.

11.name: The Doctor's Robe
11.desc: Upon entering battle, regenerates Path Resonance Energy to max and increases Path Resonance DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

12.name: Society Ticket
12.desc: Increases the number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

13.name: Faith Bond
13.desc: Reduces the Cosmic Fragments required for Blessing Enhancement, Blessing Reset, and for resetting downed characters by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

14.name: Robe of The Beauty
14.desc: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for every <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragment(s) you own.

15.name: Gold Coin of Discord
15.desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

17.name: Void Wick Trimmer
17.desc: After obtaining this Curio, randomly repairs up to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> destroyed Curio(s) and restores their remaining uses to default.

18.name: Omniscient Capsule
18.desc: You can now open your Inventory to use Consumables while in the Simulated Universe. This Curio will be destroyed after <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Consumables have been used

19.name: Record from Beyond the Sky
19.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after they are attacked, and cannot be debuffed for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

20.name: Entropic Die
20.desc: Randomly Enhances <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Blessing(s) immediately after obtaining this Curio.

21.name: Shining Trapezohedron Die
21.desc: Replaces all Curios currently in possession (including this Curio) with random Curios.

22.name: Sealing Wax of Preservation
22.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Preservation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Preservation to appear.

23.name: Sealing Wax of Elation
23.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Elation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Elation to appear.

24.name: Sealing Wax of The Hunt
24.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of The Hunt after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of The Hunt to appear.

25.name: Sealing Wax of Destruction
25.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Destruction after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Destruction to appear.

26.name: Sealing Wax of Remembrance
26.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Remembrance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Remembrance to appear.

27.name: Sealing Wax of Nihility
27.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Nihility after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Nihility to appear.

28.name: Sealing Wax of Abundance
28.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Abundance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Abundance to appear.

45.name: Corrupted Code
45.desc: Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.\nWhile the code is being fixed, a character loses all their Energy when they Break enemy Weaknesses.\nOnce the code is fixed, this Curio regenerates characters' Energy.

46.name: Corrupted Code
46.desc: When a character Breaks enemy Weaknesses, they regenerate <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

47.name: Odd Code
47.desc: Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.\nWhile the code is being fixed, a character loses <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their current HP every time they use their Ultimate.\nOnce the code is fixed, this Curio restores HP for characters.

48.name: Odd Code
48.desc: Every time a character uses their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP.

49.name: Normal Code
49.desc: Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.\nWhile the code is being fixed, allies take <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> more DMG while their HP percentage is below <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP.\nOnce the code is fixed, this Curio reduces DMG taken by allies.

50.name: Normal Code
50.desc: Characters receive <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> less DMG while their HP percentage is below <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP.

51.name: Elegant Code
51.desc: Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.\nWhile the code is being fixed, a random enemy's action will be Advanced Forward by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> every time a character uses a Skill.\nOnce the code is fixed, this Curio Advances Forward characters' actions.

52.name: Elegant Code
52.desc: After a character uses a Skill, their next action will be advanced forward by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

53.name: Mysterious Code
53.desc: Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.\nWhile the code is being fixed, enemies deal <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG when another enemy unit is defeated by a character.\nOnce the code is fixed, this Curio increases DMG dealt by all allies.

54.name: Mysterious Code
54.desc: All allies deal <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG after an enemy is defeated.

55.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
55.desc: Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.\nWhile the code is being fixed, each time after a character uses a Skill, they consume <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> extra Skill Points.\nOnce the code is fixed, this Curio makes characters' Basic ATK recover extra Skill Points.

56.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
56.desc: Recovers <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> extra Skill Point(s) when characters use Basic ATK.

57.name: Shattered Star Bait
57.desc: Increase characters' movement speed on the map by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. During combat, characters' actions are Advanced Forward by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> after they take action.

58.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer
58.desc: Increases all characters' DMG dealt by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for every destructible object that has been destroyed.

59.name: Insect Web
59.desc: Upon entering battle, the character currently with the highest ATK will become Parasitized. While Parasitized, the character's ATK increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, but will lose HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of their current HP at the start of every turn. When this character is knocked down, Parasitized will be transferred to a random character.

60.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser
60.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> times, this Curio will be destroyed and the amount of Cosmic Fragment(s) currently held will be doubled.

61.name: Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts
61.desc: The current exploration will not terminate if your team is defeated in battle outside of a final domain. Instead, the battle will be considered as a victory, and all characters will recover HP up to their respective Max HP. After triggering this effect <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> time(s), this Curio will be destroyed.

62.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all allies' Eidolon Resonance level by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>.

65.name: Divination Cuckoo Clock

71.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
71.desc: Upon entering battle, consume <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Skill Point.
